import{gsap}from'gsap';import{ScrollTrigger}from'gsap/ScrollTrigger';import{TextPlugin}from'gsap/TextPlugin';// Register GSAP plugins
gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger,TextPlugin);// Fade in animation
export const fadeIn=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;let delay=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return gsap.fromTo(element,{opacity:0,y:50},{opacity:1,y:0,duration,delay,ease:"power2.out"});};// Slide in from left
export const slideInLeft=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;let delay=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return gsap.fromTo(element,{x:-100,opacity:0},{x:0,opacity:1,duration,delay,ease:"power2.out"});};// Slide in from right
export const slideInRight=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;let delay=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return gsap.fromTo(element,{x:100,opacity:0},{x:0,opacity:1,duration,delay,ease:"power2.out"});};// Slide in from bottom
export const slideInUp=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;let delay=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return gsap.fromTo(element,{y:100,opacity:0},{y:0,opacity:1,duration,delay,ease:"power2.out"});};// Scale in animation
export const scaleIn=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0.8;let delay=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return gsap.fromTo(element,{scale:0,opacity:0},{scale:1,opacity:1,duration,delay,ease:"back.out(1.7)"});};// Stagger animation for multiple elements
export const staggerAnimation=function(elements){let animation=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:fadeIn;let stagger=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0.2;return gsap.fromTo(elements,{opacity:0,y:50},{opacity:1,y:0,duration:0.8,stagger,ease:"power2.out"});};// Text reveal animation
export const textReveal=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1.5;let delay=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return gsap.fromTo(element,{opacity:0,y:30},{opacity:1,y:0,duration,delay,ease:"power2.out"});};// Parallax effect
export const parallaxEffect=function(element){let speed=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0.5;return gsap.to(element,{yPercent:-50*speed,ease:"none",scrollTrigger:{trigger:element,start:"top bottom",end:"bottom top",scrub:true}});};// Floating animation
export const floatingAnimation=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:2;return gsap.to(element,{y:-20,duration,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};// Pulse animation
export const pulseAnimation=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return gsap.to(element,{scale:1.1,duration,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};// Rotate animation
export const rotateAnimation=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:3;return gsap.to(element,{rotation:360,duration,ease:"none",repeat:-1});};// Bounce in animation
export const bounceIn=function(element){let duration=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;let delay=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return gsap.fromTo(element,{scale:0,opacity:0},{scale:1,opacity:1,duration,delay,ease:"bounce.out"});};// Hero section animation sequence
export const heroAnimation=(heroRef,titleRef,subtitleRef,ctaRef)=>{const tl=gsap.timeline();tl.fromTo(heroRef,{opacity:0,scale:1.1},{opacity:1,scale:1,duration:1.5,ease:"power2.out"}).fromTo(titleRef,{opacity:0,y:50},{opacity:1,y:0,duration:1,ease:"power2.out"},"-=0.5").fromTo(subtitleRef,{opacity:0,y:30},{opacity:1,y:0,duration:0.8,ease:"power2.out"},"-=0.3").fromTo(ctaRef,{opacity:0,scale:0.8},{opacity:1,scale:1,duration:0.6,ease:"back.out(1.7)"},"-=0.2");return tl;};// Scroll-triggered animations
export const scrollTriggerAnimation=function(element){let animation=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:fadeIn;let trigger=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"top 80%";return gsap.fromTo(element,{opacity:0,y:50},{opacity:1,y:0,duration:1,ease:"power2.out",scrollTrigger:{trigger:element,start:trigger,toggleActions:"play none none reverse"}});};// Enhanced scroll-triggered card animation
export const scrollTriggerCardAnimation=function(element){let index=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;let trigger=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"top 85%";return gsap.fromTo(element,{opacity:0,y:100,scale:0.8,rotation:5},{opacity:1,y:0,scale:1,rotation:0,duration:1.2,delay:index*0.2,ease:"back.out(1.7)",scrollTrigger:{trigger:element,start:trigger,toggleActions:"play none none reverse"}});};// Scroll-triggered icon animation
export const scrollTriggerIconAnimation=function(element){let index=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;let trigger=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"top 90%";return gsap.fromTo(element,{opacity:0,scale:0,rotation:-180},{opacity:1,scale:1,rotation:0,duration:0.8,delay:index*0.3,ease:"back.out(1.7)",scrollTrigger:{trigger:element,start:trigger,toggleActions:"play none none reverse"}});};// Card interaction animations
export const cardHoverAnimation=element=>{return gsap.to(element,{y:-15,scale:1.02,duration:0.4,ease:"power2.out"});};export const cardLeaveAnimation=element=>{return gsap.to(element,{y:0,scale:1,duration:0.4,ease:"power2.out"});};export const iconHoverAnimation=element=>{return gsap.to(element,{scale:1.1,rotation:5,duration:0.3,ease:"back.out(1.7)"});};export const iconLeaveAnimation=element=>{return gsap.to(element,{scale:1,rotation:0,duration:0.3,ease:"power2.out"});};// Continuous card movement animations
export const continuousCardFloat=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{y:-3,duration:4,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};export const continuousCardSway=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{x:2,rotation:0.5,duration:6,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};export const continuousCardPulse=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{scale:1.005,duration:3,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};export const continuousIconRotate=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{rotation:360,duration:8,delay:delay,ease:"none",repeat:-1});};export const continuousIconFloat=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{y:-8,duration:2.5,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};export const continuousTextGlow=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{opacity:0.8,duration:2,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};// Button movement animations
export const continuousButtonFloat=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{y:-5,duration:2.5,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};export const continuousButtonPulse=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{scale:1.05,duration:1.8,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};export const continuousButtonGlow=function(element){let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;return gsap.to(element,{boxShadow:"0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)",duration:2,delay:delay,ease:"power1.inOut",yoyo:true,repeat:-1});};// Cleanup function
export const cleanupAnimations=()=>{ScrollTrigger.getAll().forEach(trigger=>trigger.kill());};
